update proxy
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=CHAR},
proxy_ip = #{proxyIp,jdbcType=CHAR},
port = #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ip_value = #{ipValue,jdbcType=BIGINT},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select:
select
from proxy where availbel_score >0 and connection_score >0 order by availbel_score desc limit 200
